description:
Kickstart your best lawn season yet

Give your lawn staying power with two powerful formulas designed for summer lawn care, enhanced stress tolerance, and lasting weed control.

Help your lawn thrive through summer challenges. This premium kit combines our heat-tolerant granular fertilizer with concentrated summer weed control for superior performance. You'll get up to 70 days of sustained feeding plus improved stress tolerance while keeping weeds at bay. Perfect when your grass needs both quick greening and protection.

At Sunday, we create lawn solutions without harsh chemicals—so you can return to enjoying your lawn faster.

Kit Benefits:

What's Included:

2 Core Seagreen Granular Fertilizer (24-0-4 NPK): Fast-acting spring formula with iron and kelp for deep greening. Two 12 lb. bags cover 8,000 sq. ft.

1 Dandelion Doom Concentrate: Iron-based selective weed control for spring broadleaf weeds.

Instructions:

sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Yard Advisors:
When should I apply this spring kit?
Apply when soil temperatures reach 55°F and grass starts actively growing. Typically early to mid-spring, depending on your region.
How much area does this kit cover?
The two fertilizer bags cover up to 8,000 sq. ft. Weed control coverage varies based on weed presence.
Can I apply everything at once?
Start with weed control, let dry completely, then apply fertilizer. Reapply weed control 3-4 weeks later for best results. This ensures maximum effectiveness of both products.
Is this safe for all grass types?
Yes! This kit works for all common residential grass types except centipede grass (limit to twice yearly).
When will I see results?
You'll see greening within days and weed control results within hours. Sustained feeding continues for 45 days.
How to Apply Sunday Products in Order
Maximize your yard's potential with Sunday lawn care products. Apply in the correct order for the best results, ensuring a lush, thriving lawn and yard.
